description: This file defines React-like components using LightningJS framework for rendering a notes list and individual note items, including styling, creation, rendering, and interaction logic.

classes.name: NoteListItem
classes.description: Component representing a single note item in the list, including rendering, styling, and event handling.

classes.name: NoteList
classes.description: Component representing the list of notes, managing item rendering, focus, and interactions such as creating, deleting, and selecting notes.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches the list of notes from the data provider and updates the list display.

methods.name: _moveFocus
methods.description: Internal method to move focus up or down within the list items.
